name: Automated Webinar Signup Verification & Personalized Welcome Kit

values.content:
=  Create a warm, personalized welcome message for a webinar attendee with the following details:
   
   Name: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.name }}
   Company: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.company }}
   Session Preference: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.session_preference }}
   
   The message should:
   - Welcome them enthusiastically
   - Confirm their session preference
   - Build excitement about the webinar content
   - Be professional yet friendly
   - Be 3-4 paragraphs
   
   Do not include subject line or email formatting, just the message body.

parameters.name: =Webinar_Welcome_Kit_{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.name.replace(" ", "_")}}_{{$now.format("yyyy-MM-dd")}}
parameters.content:
=WELCOME TO OUR WEBINAR!

Attendee: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.name }}
Company: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.company }}
Session: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.session_preference }}

---

{{$node["Generate Welcome Message"].json["output"][0]["content"][0]["text"]}}

---

WEBINAR SCHEDULE:

Morning Session: 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM EST
Afternoon Session: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM EST

WHAT TO PREPARE:
- Notebook for key insights
- Questions you'd like answered
- Stable internet connection

TIPS FOR SUCCESS:
- Join 5 minutes early
- Test your audio/video beforehand
- Engage in the chat and Q&A

We're excited to have you join us!

parameters.message:
=

{{$node["Generate Welcome Message"].json["output"][0]["content"][0]["text"].replace(/\n/g, "
")}}

Attached is your personalized welcome kit with all the details you need.

Looking forward to seeing you at the webinar!

Best regards,
The Webinar Team
parameters.subject: =Welcome to [Webinar Name] - Your Session Details Inside!

values.content:
=Generate additional learning materials for {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.name }} including:
   - Pre-webinar reading list (5 articles)
   - Key terminology to know
   - Advanced questions to consider
   
   Make it specific to their session: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.session_preference }}

parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('Store Attendee Data').item.json.Name }},

Thank you for your interest in going deeper before the webinar!

As promised, we‚Äôve prepared **additional learning materials tailored specifically to your selected session**. These resources will help you get more value from the discussion and come prepared with advanced questions.

üìé **Attached:**
‚Äì Pre-webinar reading list
‚Äì Key concepts & terminology
‚Äì Thought-provoking questions to consider

We recommend reviewing these materials before the session to make the most of the live experience.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reply to this email.

Looking forward to having you with us at the webinar!

Best regards,
**The Webinar Team**
parameters.subject: Extra Materials for [Webinar Name]

parameters.content:
## **Automated Webinar Signup Verification & Personalized Welcome Kit**
This workflow automates the complete lifecycle of a webinar signup ‚Äî from email verification to personalized onboarding and follow-up delivery. It ensures only valid attendees are accepted, prevents fake or mistyped email registrations, and delivers a premium, personalized experience without manual effort.

Once a user submits the signup form, the workflow validates their email in real time. Invalid signups are immediately flagged to organizers via Slack and stopped to protect list quality. Valid signups are stored in Google Sheets as the single source of truth for attendees.

For verified attendees, the workflow uses AI to generate a warm, personalized welcome message based on the attendee‚Äôs name, company, and session preference. A complete welcome kit is automatically created, converted into a PDF, and emailed to the attendee. Organizers are notified instantly when a verified attendee joins.

If the attendee requests extra learning materials, the workflow dynamically generates advanced session-specific resources, converts them into a PDF, and sends a follow-up email with those materials attached.

### How it works
1. Capture webinar signup via webhook
2. Verify email authenticity
3. Reject invalid signups and alert organizers
4. Store verified attendee data
5. Generate AI-powered welcome content
6. Deliver welcome kit via email
7. Generate and send optional extra materials

### Setup steps
* Configure webhook endpoint
* Add VerifiEmail, OpenAI, Google, Gmail, and Slack credentials
* Replace spreadsheet and Slack channel IDs
* Activate workflow and test with sample signups

## Signup Intake & Email Validation

Captures webinar signup data and verifies email authenticity before allowing the user into the system.

## Invalid Signup Handling

Stops fake or invalid registrations and alerts organizers instantly to protect data quality.

## Verified Attendee Storage

Stores verified attendee details securely in Google Sheets for tracking and reporting.

## Personalized Welcome Content

Uses AI to generate a custom welcome message and creates a downloadable welcome kit.

## Welcome Email Delivery & Notification

Sends the welcome email with the PDF attached and notifies organizers in Slack.

## Extra Materials Creation & Follow-up

Creates a PDF of extra learning materials and sends a follow-up email to the attendee.

## Optional Extra Materials Flow

Checks if extra materials were requested and generates advanced session-specific content if needed.
